faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our Mori Studio AI platform and its magical Ghibli-style image transformation features.

items.question: What is Mori Studio AI?
items.answer: Mori Studio AI is a specialized image transformation platform that uses advanced artificial intelligence to convert any photo into authentic Studio Ghibli-style artwork, or create new Ghibli-inspired images from text descriptions.

items.question: How does Ghibli-style transformation work?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes your input image and applies Studio Ghibli's signature artistic elements: soft textures, magical lighting, character design principles, and natural atmospheric effects to create authentic Ghibli-style artwork.

items.question: Can I create new Ghibli scenes from text?
items.answer: Yes! You can describe a scene in text and our AI will generate new Ghibli-style artwork with authentic Studio Ghibli aesthetics, character designs, and magical storytelling elements.

items.question: Which Ghibli film styles are available?
items.answer: We offer multiple Studio Ghibli film styles including My Neighbor Totoro, Spirited Away, Princess Mononoke, Howl's Moving Castle, and other classic Ghibli aesthetics with authentic artistic details.

items.question: Are there any usage limits or restrictions?
items.answer: Usage depends on your plan and API limits. Our platform includes content filtering to ensure appropriate use while maintaining the magical and family-friendly spirit of Studio Ghibli films.

items.question: Can I use generated Ghibli-style images commercially?
items.answer: Generated images are for personal and creative use. Please review our terms of service for detailed usage rights regarding Ghibli-style artwork and commercial applications.
